title: Fragment, 16th–17th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: couching stitches on plain weave
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Anonymous Donor
description: Fragment of a wide border of white linen embroidered in white in a design showing a symmetrical, ogival pattern with conventionalized floral motifs. Couching stitches produce a cable-like effect. Knots symmetrically placed to form part of the design.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 16th–17th century.Medium: linen
Technique: couching stitches on plain weave. Museum purchase through gift of Anonymous Donor. 1949-64-14.
